title: Input schema for Smart article extractor
description: Based on your use case, input either a URL that will scrape the news site or a category (e.g. “sports”) located on the portal. Limit articles extracted based on their number, date or, if scraping periodically, only new publications.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: Can be main page URL or any category URLs. Article pages are found and enqueued from these.

maxArticlesPerCrawl.title: Maximum number of articles
maxArticlesPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of valid articles scraped. The crawler will stop automatically after reaching this number.

dateFrom.title: Date from
dateFrom.description: Only articles from this day to present will be scraped. If empty, all articles will be scraped. Format is YYYY-MM-DD, e.g. 2019-12-31, or Number type e.g. 1 week or 20 days

onlyNewArticlesPerDomain.title: Only new articles
onlyNewArticlesPerDomain.description: If true, will scrape only new articles each time you run it. All URLs you scraped are compared with saved ones. Scraped articles are saved in one dataset per each domain, datasets are named 'ARTICLES-SCRAPED-domain'
